text: I've started an open source project on Github that I plan to use for OMSI. It's a drop-in library so that your Mac app can show an onscreen keyboard with custom design and function. <https://github.com/spilliams/SWSoftKeyboard>
I'll almost certainly write a blog post on it when it's complete
in Textmate 2 you can quickly replace all instances of a word by first searching for the word (cmd-f) then selecting all instances (cmd-alt-f). snappy!
